verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Now, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> yes, you shall <S%H3045>show<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

Then <S%H559>say<s%> you, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it, that her <S%H6256>time<s%> may <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> herself to <S%H2930>defile<s%> herself.

You are <S%H816>become<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood<s%> that you have <S%H8210>shed;<s%> and have <S%H2930>defiled<s%> yourself in your <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>made;<s%> and you have caused your <S%H3117>days<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> and are <S%H935>come<s%> even to your <S%H8141>years:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and a <S%H7048>mocking<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>countries.<s%>
Those that be <S%H7138>near,<s%> and those that be <S%H7350>far<s%> from you, shall <S%H7046>mock<s%> you, which are <S%H2931>infamous<s%> <S%H8034><s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4103>vexed.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> were in you to their <S%H2220>power<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

In you have they set <S%H7043>light<s%> by <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother:<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you have they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression<s%> with the <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> in you have they <S%H3238>vexed<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H490>widow.<s%>
You have <S%H959>despised<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

In you are <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H7400>carry<s%> <S%H7400>tales<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and in you they <S%H398>eat<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

In you have they <S%H1540>discovered<s%> their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> in you have they <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her that was <S%H5079>set<s%> <S%H5079>apart<s%> for <S%H2931>pollution.<s%>

And one has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> and <S%H376>another<s%> has <S%H2154>lewdly<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter<s%> in <S%H3618>law;<s%> and <S%H376>another<s%> in you has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

In you have they <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7810>gifts<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> and <S%H8635>increase,<s%> and you have greedily <S%H1214>gained<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> by <S%H6233>extortion,<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> therefore I have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> my <S%H3079>hand<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> your <S%H1215>dishonest<s%> <S%H1214>gain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you.

Can your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5975>endure,<s%> or can your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you? I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.
And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> you in the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H8552>consume<s%> your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> out of you.
And you shall take your <S%H2490>inheritance<s%> in yourself in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is to me <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they are <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H913>tin,<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace;<s%> they are even the <S%H5509>dross<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

As they <S%H6910>gather<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> and <S%H913>tin,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> to <S%H5301>blow<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> on it, to <S%H5413>melt<s%> it; <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> you in my <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and I will <S%H5117>leave<s%> you there, and <S%H5413>melt<s%> you.
Yes, I will <S%H3664>gather<s%> you, and <S%H5301>blow<s%> on you in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and you shall be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> therof.

As <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2046>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H2534>fury<s%> on you.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to her, You are the <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1656>rained<s%> on in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

There is a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof, like a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey;<s%> they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H5315>souls;<s%> they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H2633>treasure<s%> and <S%H3366>precious<s%> things; they have made her <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof.

Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2554>violated<s%> my <S%H8451>law,<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> things: they have put <S%H3808>no<s%> difference <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>profane,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have they <S%H3045>showed<s%> difference <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and have <S%H5956>hid<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and I am <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> thereof are like <S%H2061>wolves<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5315>souls,<s%> to <S%H1214>get<s%> <S%H1215>dishonest<s%> <S%H1214>gain.<s%>

And her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> them with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> mortar, seeing <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and <S%H7080>divining<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have used <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and exercised <S%H1498>robbery,<s%> and have <S%H3238>vexed<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy:<s%> yes, they have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H3808>wrongfully.<s%> <S%H4941><s%>

And I <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> among them, that should <S%H1443>make<s%> up the <S%H1447>hedge,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6556>gap<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for the <S%H776>land,<s%> that I should not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it: but I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>

Therefore have I <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on them; I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> their own <S%H1870>way<s%> have I <S%H5414>recompensed<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
